snippet: The decision by Representative Bill Owens leaves his upstate New York district a tossup, and vulnerable to a Republican takeover in November.
abstract: Rep Bill Owens, Democrat who has clung to his seat in a politically divided district along New York State’s Canadian border, says he will not run for a third full term; Owens is latest Democrat whose decision to leave Congress may hurt his party's chances of gaining in the House in November.
lead_paragraph: The decision by Representative Bill Owens leaves his upstate New York district a tossup, and vulnerable to a Republican takeover in November.

headline.seo: Rep. Bill Owens of New York to Retire From Congress
headline.main: Another Democrat in Tight House District Won’t Run Again
headline.print_headline: Upstate Congressman Won’t Seek New Term
